website_summaries.verdict: Simple and sturdy, this inexpensive 4-wheel hand truck can be quickly transformed into a dolly and back as needed, making it a great all-around model.
pros: Easily swaps between 2 and 4 wheel positions without tools
Folds flat for convenient storage and fits in most car trunks
Available in pink, orange, and green
cons: Larger wheels would’ve been a plus

customer_reviews.title: stronger than i think
customer_reviews.text: very handy, i was worried about the weight capacity but i used this to move my washer and dryer. update: when i trying to brag my nice lit gadget to my friend, my friend showed me his Milwaukee one, cheaper and no need to change the wheels and have selflocking wheels already, also his "folding pad" is bigger! OMG, totally stole my thunder. 1 star down!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Spooky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect To Get The Job Done.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have made in awhile. I'm a RN and work primarily in a hospital, but during the fall I travel around to different companies/offices in my vicinity to administer flu shots. This cart has been perfect for lugging the box, sharps container, and cooler with vaccine. Prior to this I was using one that felt like it was going to fall apart. This one can handle 3 boxes of supples. Haven't had any issues with the wheels, but will just replace with heavy duty ones from HD in the future if needed. Mostly use it in the first flatbedstting, I assume the upright setting is just as good. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: TravelingFish

customer_reviews.title: a very convenient helper!
customer_reviews.text: Using this for grocery deliveries is the BEST!!! i have EDS and cant carry things without worrying about my joints dislocating so i got this cool thing. Only used it for deliveries twice so far but it has already made my life sooooo much easier! Folds up super flat and very light! ALSO ITS PINK!! THE PERFECT PINK!!!! i really love this thing so glad! also the price was only $60 when i ordered it. definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl nobel

customer_reviews.title: I love this dolly/cart!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most useful tools I have ever owned! The only complaint I have is the folding it is a little bit tricky. It has to be learned and also one has to watch fingers because they get pinched once in a while. Until recently, this was the only dolly that I needed. Then I had to empty mom’s apartment, so I did buy a larger handtruck, but this little dolly does almost everything you need to do, and when it folds into a cart, a box or bags of groceries will just sit very nicely on it. As long as you watch your fingers, you will love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: Independently Able To Handle My Own Baggage! (No need to unload it on anyone else)
customer_reviews.text: Independently Able To Handle My Own Baggage! (No need to unload it on anyone else) This fit perfectly in one of my bags so after grabbing all my luggage, I was able to unzip and pop open the cart. I also used small bungee cords to keep everything in place. Practice loading your luggage before you leave so you know what works and what is stable.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. DuRAGE

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment
customer_reviews.text: I am running an online business and I ship USPS a lot. Every other day I go down to the post office I am taking almost 300 lbs of books with me. This hand truck is easy to fold and set up and it takes very little space in my trunk. A little bit hard to turn when you have a lot of stuff on it but I learn to how to maneuver it over time. It's in my daughter's favorite color - pink too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Great cart, heavy but great.
customer_reviews.text: I got the pink cart and I like it. It is a bit heavy but easy to use. I use it going across the city to carry packages. I pack things on it them put it in a cab/über (folding it down) and then repack to go up to my flat. When in the dolly configuration it is a bit tall. Overall it is a great cart. I just wish it weighed a bit less. Make sure you get a bungee cord.
customer_reviews.author: AVAgril97

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable, light weight, and stores easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Aug 2018 and forgot about it. I didnt take it out of the box until May 2019. Omg!!! It helped so much with moving heavy boxes. It really is light weight and it stores easily. Only be careful when closing it bc it can catch your fingers (I found that out after the 4th time closing it)
customer_reviews.author: 1ofthe5qs

customer_reviews.title: We now have 3, in 3 different colors
customer_reviews.text: My small non-profit and I haul many bins to and from schools, loaded with science equipment. We were given the first one by a teacher who didn't want it anymore. At first, we were scared to fold it and unfold it. After a while though, we figured out how to use it and now, we can't go anywhere without it! We ordered two more! I just wish the bed was just 3 inches longer so we can hold two of our bins on the bed comfortably. The bins we use are like the Akro-Mils 66486 type.
customer_reviews.author: E Gaskell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I lived without this. My sister in law had one that I borrowed then just broke down and bought one. Why did I wait so long? I Have a small business and do vendor events, I can get tons on it and make less trips. It's not great on gravel but it's not made for that either. I haven't used it as a hand cart yet. I recommend this product, I had husbands at events with their wives tell me they were jealous as I would easily loading and packing up and they were hand carrying boxes and boxes. What used to take me 5-7 trips now takes me 2!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy B

customer_reviews.title: Handle Should Extend in Cart Position, Otherwise Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We needed a cart that fit into our sedan trunk, and boy did this fit the bill. It collapses nearly flat and transforms as advertised, no gotchas. It is can hold a lot in both positions. The upper wheels are pretty small, so it doesn't maneuver as well in cart mode, but it's a reasonable trade off for being able to fold nearly flat. In cart mode you have to stoop down to roll the cart. We would like to see an extendable handle added to future models. It is still five star product in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: YChilds

customer_reviews.title: Such a help!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a help getting my daughter moved into her dorm. It's lightweight and easy to fold. I used it as both a handtruck (for her fridge) and as a cart. There is a flap that flips up to keep things from falling off the back when going uphill. I didn't realize this until something fell off the back, but that was user error. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Murfissa

customer_reviews.title: Made moving so easy
customer_reviews.text: This made moving so easy, it could carry a lot of heavy boxes at a time, and it has come in handy to bring up heavy groceries as well. It can be folded two ways which is really nice if you want to pull it or if you want it to be a stand up dolly. I read the reviews that said it snaps when you fold it back down, and it definitely does, just keep your hands away from the wheels when you fold it and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: LISTEN UP! DO NOT PUT YOUR FINGERS ANYWHERE AROUND OR ABOVE THE WHEELS! IT’LL BITE YA! Just open and close by pushing the “fold” button and lowering/lifting the handle at the top! Otherwise, I love this little handtruck! Makes getting groceries out of the car much easier and only takes one trip! Along with hauling boxes, trash, all of that good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Works Great But Beware
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dolly! BUT, everyone who warns you about the potential for hurting yourself when folding it are correct. The big wheel side is spring loaded. Do NOT put your fingers anywhere near those wheels while folding it for storage. It's instinct. But do NOT do it. It's powerful enough to break skin, bruise, or if you're frail, a finger. But, if you don't put your hand there, no problem. This thing is great. It hauls really big and heavy items smoothly with no problem and folds down for easy storage. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Smac

customer_reviews.title: How do you fold to store this thing?
customer_reviews.text: Attending a trade show in NYC and have to walk to the venue, solid 15 minute walk is the closest parking. They have porter service but at the end of the show, having to go get my car, wait my turn is not ideal. Figure I can load everything on this bad boy and jet. Ease to go from transition though I am unsure how to fold it to store it. Less a start for not bothering to put proper instructions inside the box. Instructions are on the handle and you can barely make them out.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Turner

customer_reviews.title: great little cart
customer_reviews.text: been using it for 2 months now..no issues...the only thing i would complain about is I wish the handle to pull it when in cart form was a bit longer. I am 5 foot 8. If you are a couple inches shorter that wouldnt even be a issue. I really like that the wheels fold up flat
customer_reviews.author: pandora

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made. It folds up so it fits in my coat closet by the front door. I plan to use it to put my delivered at the door groceries away. Canned goods can be very heavy. I am 82 and this is not too heavy for me to manage to take to my garage to wheel in items such as a case of cokes or other heavy boxes. I am sure I will find many uses for this little pink truck.
customer_reviews.author: Dotti

customer_reviews.title: Love this little cart!
customer_reviews.text: This little cart has been a lifesaver. I didn't add or change any wheels, and after a year of fairly heavy use (two moves), it still works fine. Just used it to move a large (6'x3') heavy desk today. I was worried about the reviews talking about hand injuries but am so glad I gave this cart a try. It does snap shut but it's easy to close without getting your hand near any moving parts. I've never had any issues with hand injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: I live on the 5th floor of an apartment complex and I am the furthest from the elevator. Whenever I buy a lot of groceries or receive a large package it is a pain to get back to my place. Since having this cart, things have been WAY easier. I was literally stopped in the hallway by a neighbor I have never met before asking where I got it. It has only been a few weeks but I am a big fan already!
customer_reviews.author: M Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Super practical and functional
customer_reviews.text: This little cart has been one of my best Amazon purchases. both the cart and dolly functions are extremely useful and I have not had any problems loading it with very heavy items. It has been in use for 2 years, used nearly once a week with groceries and through two moves, with no signs of weakness-- some cosmetic paint chip from use but to be expected. It is not a full-size dolly so there are some limitations, but it is absolutely worth the price for the functionality, versatility, and compact size. I leave it in the back of my small car for use unloading groceries and it takes up almost no space.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I told my husband I accidentally bought the pink one... XD
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed for my tiny apartment! It folds up, but I usually keep it in my trunk for grocery hauls and other bigger items that are difficult to carry. Plus, ONE TRIP!! I am fortunate to have an elevator in my apartment and do not have to use stairs with this, so not sure how well they will work maneuvering up or down but it does turn into a dolly so I’m guessing you could if you needed it. Also, I absolutely love the color!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & Happy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little cart / dolly I’ve seen or had . When I ordered it I was looking for something small & easy to use for my job , am a courier & never know when am picking up bigger items & heavy things but now am always prepared in fits nicely folded in my truck easy to take out & open/close . It also holds more than u think . It’s the prettiest pink and everyone is always telling me how pretty it is . Great item for working women like myself,, it was just what I was looking for . Great price for this amazing cart . Perfect for home or work.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, simple, and portable
customer_reviews.text: This hand trolley converts very easily between collapsed and the two usable configurations. I can probably switch between using all four wheels and the two wheel variant within 10 seconds, just push the button and pull a handle and it changes! So far, I don't think I've moved anything over 150lbs, but it handled the 150 very well. Only complaint is that in the 4-wheel configuration, the two smaller wheels can have a lot of vibration on rougher terrain like a parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: ChemEKyle

customer_reviews.title: Not a workhorse.
customer_reviews.text: The fold up system is great, but it’s a little on the weak side. Bought it for moving and it worked great with freezers and such...although there were better choices I liked the fold up option. Doesn’t really feel like it’s going to be super durable, maybe I will be proven wrong. It’s good for a quick move wouldn’t plan on it for a daily user.
customer_reviews.author: Spinner Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, I got it for an apartnment living and during COVID no one brings anything up anymore. It hasnt gotten a workout. The only issue is that the bars are so big you cannot attached bungee cords to them and there is really no other areas to latch onto.
customer_reviews.author: Crys Curkendoll

customer_reviews.title: Great for grocery deliveries!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to use doing grocery deliveries and I don't regret it one bit. It is handy for large cases of water or huge bags of dog food. I read a review that mentioned getting your fingers pinched when collapsing the cart while folding it up. Well this happened to me the very first time I used it and even though it hurt...a lot, I was not injured. After that I used the tip of an umbrella to pushed the button. With use it becomes a lot easier to close up and I don't have to use the umbrella anymore. This is a high quality and very sturdy cart.
customer_reviews.author: C Langworthy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time carrying drinks and groceries into the house, after I hurt my back. This has saved the day. I love the color (pink) and it has really come in handy for more than I bought it for. I use it mainly as a flat cart. It is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: snowfall

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this hand truck but some difficulties climbing stairs.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to use once you figure it out, it’s hard to take up the stairs if you have a heavy load like a couple of cases of water plus other groceries. I was hoping for easy stair climbing with heavy items but over all I am very pleased with this hand truck.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great cart, pink color prevents the boys from stealing it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart, it saves me a lot of trouble. I love that it is pink becuase none of my guy friends want to borrow it lol. Only criticism is the base plate (when using as a dolly) is too short and you can't put very large boxes/items on it, but as a cart, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great product, price, shopping experience.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my move. It is awesome, can use as a cart or dolly. Folds very compact. I have long walk to my place from garage, so use almost weekly for groceries, supplies, cases of drinks, bags of dog food, school books, projects, transporting large night stand/chest was ridiculously easy, taking trash to the shoot, soo many uses! Ordered in pink, so my guys won't try to steal it, but when they see how great it is, I think they don't care about the color lol. Been using for 2+yrs now, still looks great. Shopping experience was great, priced right, fast shipping, no hassles!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: A pink hand truck!
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome! I got it for my daughter who helps me w service work at my business. It’s strong but light and easy to fold up and keep in her van. And the colorfulness makes it especially fun and easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Omar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap But Worth It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I am amazed how much I use thing. I got just to carry my weights (with a crate) to and from my gym. I have found it good for Costco, laundry, trash, and more. I even push my friends around in it just for fun. I upgraded the wheels as well. Because of this it rolls nice on carpet and can handle a heavier load. Oh, I got it in pink! So many complements.
customer_reviews.author: Godofhumor

customer_reviews.title: Tires wear out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the fact that it doesn't take much room. It opens and closes really easy, however, I didn't like the fact that my small tires are almost worn out after only the first use. It would be helpful if there was an extra set of the small tires since they don't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen Kaye Agpaoa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I honestly loved it,handly on my most recent move to an apartment,i was able to add furniture and other heavy things on top. Absolutely had no problem with folding the wheels in and out. Instructions are very clear! I love the pink tone and it just fits my personality. I’d recommend to buy for occasions that you are handling with heavy items.
customer_reviews.author: Jasha Siu

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product Is ready to go, right out of the box! No need to put a bunch of parts together. Easy to unfold. This is exactly the same color and build as the picture. I use this to deliver supplies for my business, it is much easier to fit in my car than a regular hand truck. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karly

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, a little cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. I love the weight that it holds. It can be opened 2 different ways for different purposes, which is great. It's a little tricky at the beginning figuring out how to open and close it. I wish the handle extended a little more; it's awkward rolling the cart when it's full in the "cart" position ( vs hand truck) Overall, a decent item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Anderko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little hand truck!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little hand truck. It works exactly as advertised, and I’ve loaded boxes on it with ease. The only gripe I have is that going up stair, or up onto a curb is a bit difficult, but nothing that a couple of cords can’t handle.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic cart/dolly - sturdy and compact
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried it on stairs yet. I'm on the 3rd floor of one building and my storage unit is in the basement of another. I mostly needed to be able to get around the other building with storage bins. The handle when used as a dolly is a little short for me, so I wouldn't recommend it for most men (I'm almost 6ft tall). Using it as a hand cart worked better. I definitely need bungee cords to keep things on it. I went around a corner quickly and the bins slid off. I attribute most of the issues I had with it to user error. Folding and converting were easy.
customer_reviews.author: Frances F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in preparation for a move. I don't know if it would be sturdy enough to move hundreds of pounds, but sturdy enough for moving a few boxes at a time. I can throw it in the back of my SUV on those trips to the storage locker. Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Adventuregirl7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Craft Fairs!
customer_reviews.text: I sell at craft fairs. This hand truck/dolly made my most recent show so easy to break down! I was able to haul all of my inventory and display pieces back to the vendor parking area (about a block away from the craft fair site) in one trip by using it as a dolly. I then used it as a hand truck to move my EZ Up canopy. It's really easy to switch between the hand truck and the dolly and it folds down beautifully for storage. I did change the original top wheels to 3" rubbarized locking wheels based on other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Christine V

customer_reviews.title: Cosco Shifter 300-Pound Capacity Multi-Position Folding Hand Truck and Cart, Pink Pink
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY... THIS IS NOT A HAND TRUCK. IT WILL NOT PICK UP ANY BOXES! SAVE YOUR MONEY. GO BUY A REAL HAND TRUCK FROM HOME DEPOT BECAUSE YOU WON'T FIND ONE ON AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Debbeedo

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I received my new hand truck today and I love it. This is something I needed for a long time and I glad I waited for the right product. Love the Pink, this will make sure my husband doesn't claim it for his own. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Hope E

customer_reviews.title: Actually works, I bought used and it arrived like new!.
customer_reviews.text: I work for a pharmacy, delivering their expensive drugs and chemo to different clinics and other pharmacy's in the area... I got tired of the hand truck I was using It was huge and bully.... This is so lightweight! And my favorite color too!! It's super easy to fold into the different positions.. i sometimes transport heavy boxes full of glass and its no struggle or hassle to use!!.... My husband even said he's buying himself one soon just to have around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Mujtahid Haque

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for deliveries
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver for carrying case of water and heavy items from the car. It folds up to lay flat in the trunk of a passenger car with plenty of room to spare. No assembly required, I took it out the box and used it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: JulieH

customer_reviews.title: Cute a versatile!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little heavy to collapse and place in the car but I use it for moving garbage bags, laundry totes, sewing machine and tables, and lots of groceries! Use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: patrice

customer_reviews.title: I have finally found a good hand truck
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found a good hand truck,I have gotten so may compliments on it at work, it being pink, surprised at how many guys liked it, enough about the fluff, this is a sturdy, user friendly hand truck, Converts easily to a platform back to an upright, I am a woman with back problems,I can convert it easily.very sturdy for my heavy packages, I have to deliver, can"t say enough good things about this hand truck, Thank you Costco & Amazon, for making my life easier
customer_reviews.author: bestlady

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart/dolly. It's One of my best purchases from the last year easily. It goes back-and-forth, from folded to cart to hand truck and back again, smoothly and seamlessly. Gets the job done. Has saved me a lot of back pain, no doubt. It would be easier to get things up the stairs with it if the wheels were larger, but hey, you can't have everything. This thing is an homage to what clever design can become.
customer_reviews.author: Branford

customer_reviews.title: Getting the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. Was cleaning out my basement and need something that I could use to move heavy items. This item gets the job done no problem! I have even used it in cart mode and it is even better. I have been getting compliments about how awesome it look and I have told them it can be used as a dolly or a cart. Plus it comes in pink which is fantastic too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this. There are a lot of different positions you can set it to. There weren't really written instructions (only images) on how to fold it. It's a little hard to steer when all four wheels are down. But it is very convenient to store in a closet or hang up.
customer_reviews.author: soukuma

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Needed a dolly to move boxes and large packages around the house. It works well and has probably saved me a trip or two to the chiropractor. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherCustomer

customer_reviews.title: It COULD be a great cart if....
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are much too small so it limits where you can use it. Also, when folded and stored in the upright position the bottom piece for holding cargo flops down so it takes up storage room. Just a small catch would have solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: learner

customer_reviews.title: Eye pleasing dolly
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to order after i saw the reviews about it hurting your fingers but I decided to take a chance and I have not had that issue at all and it is easy to fold and put in different positions. I have been extra careful when unfolding and changing positions so maybe that is why I have avoided getting my hand caught. Anyway I got it in the pink color and it is awesome and matches all my other pink tools. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: parviz katanchi

customer_reviews.title: Two in one Hand Truck!!!  Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the fact that it can be used for two different things. Upright as a hand truck or lowered down as a cart! Easy change to both methods! I’m so happy with this and now I do t have to carry anything heavy! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edie E Hiroe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. I use it to transport items twice a month to craft fairs so it needed to be durable. I did use it to move a treadmill (under 300 pounds) which bent and scratched it a little. I understand the scratches but was surprised how easy it was to bend that's why I gave it a 4 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter moved to the city and having this has been really helpful in an apartment with long hallways. It carries alot and is still fairly easy to pull.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I didn't buy this 20 years and 4 back aches ago. So impressed! Single, rather weak woman, I moved 22 pieces of furniture with this, much easier than any other dolly. This thing is like my new best friend.
customer_reviews.author: StrictlyMystical

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great unit just be careful. I almost didn’t buy it because so many people saying you get hurt. If you are not careful you could get hurt. Just as long as you know the wheels fold under and don’t stick your fingers there, you are good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for Instacart deliveries
customer_reviews.text: I use this for Instacart and it's a game changer. Made my life so much easier. Worth every penny. Folds flat and takes up very little space. Easy to fold, but watch your fingers! Wheels are a little small and would like if they were bigger. Not very good for stairs because of the small wheels. Still use it to get from my car to customer building. Elevators help. Still good product and reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Ayala

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase of this.......
customer_reviews.text: The first was borrowed and not returned, so I saw this pink one on sale and snatched it up! It's a MUST for anyone who is single or moves heavy things in your home by yourself, but of course you want to do it safely and follow all of the instructions. The pink one is really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Frances

customer_reviews.title: Best for moving
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to be a "strong independent woman who don't need no movers" like me, then you'll have to buy this to move yourself. I used it to carry EVERYTHING to and from my condo and let me tell you it was a life saver. I stacked up to 4 boxes at a time on this bad boy and cut my trips down by over half.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this dolly as a gift for my trainer to transport her weights/equipment
customer_reviews.text: I got this dolly as a gift for my trainer to transport her weights/equipment to and from her car (she does outside workouts/boot camps). She LOVED it. Even though the base isn’t completely solid at the bottom, it held everything well. The wheels rolled smoothly even after all of her weights were added (about 200 lbs.) and it was so easy to pop up as well as collapse! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Emery

customer_reviews.title: It helped me move my nana easily. I only wished it also had the option ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so VERSATILE​. It helped me move my nana easily. I only wished it also had the option of a telescoping and locking method for the handle so I didn't have to hunch over when using it as a cart. I am short (5'4'') and I know that if I had to hunch over, it would be uncomfortable for someone any taller.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Meany

customer_reviews.title: The hand truck made it silly easy to transport and store (we just left it on)
customer_reviews.text: I should have gotten this sooner. My wife and I used this in it's laying down configuration to move a large window AC unit. This is a job she and I dread every fall to the point where we waited until December to do it this time. The hand truck made it silly easy to transport and store (we just left it on).
